name: toolbar
description: The Toolbar component provides an action toolbar that appears on hover over workflow nodes. It contains quick action buttons for common node operations like edit, delete, duplicate, or other custom actions.

files.content:
<script lang="ts">
	import { NodeToolbar, Position } from '@xyflow/svelte';
	import { cn } from '$UTILS$/utils.js';
	import type { Snippet } from 'svelte';
	import type { NodeToolbarProps } from '@xyflow/svelte';

	interface ToolbarProps extends Omit<NodeToolbarProps, 'children'> {
		class?: string;
		children?: Snippet;
	}

	let {
		class: className,
		children,
		position = Position.Bottom,
		...restProps
	}: ToolbarProps = $props();
</script>

<NodeToolbar
	class={cn(
		'flex items-center gap-1 rounded-sm border bg-background p-1.5',
		className
	)}
	{position}
	{...restProps}
>
	{#if children}
		{@render children()}
	{/if}
</NodeToolbar>
